texts.name: Zaxim
texts.biography: Zaxim is a great traveler, and from one of his trips he brought back some strange chicks that later grew into beautiful birds, but he became a great leader to everyone, and that is why under his leadership all the dodos fight even more fiercely..

specialty.description: Increases the speed of Dodos or Martial Dodos by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 5 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Dodos
